query.name: reportcategory.getlist
query.sql: select itemid id, name,'' pid,'' ReportUrl from ItemTreeBase where ObjectTypeCode=9100 union select convert(nvarchar(36),ReportId) id,name,lower(convert(nvarchar(36),FolderId)) As pid,ReportUrl from ReportBase where FolderId is not null

query.name: report.category.search
query.sql: select convert(nvarchar(36),ReportId) id,name,lower(convert(nvarchar(36),FolderId)) As pid,ReportUrl from ReportBase where FolderId ='#{FolderId}'
